name: dweb
description: Decentralized Web (dWeb): Scalable, Secure Multi-Cluster Communication. A decentralized system that facilitates secure, scalable communication across independent clusters. dWeb empowers developers to create decentralized networks and applications with distributed governance, cross-cluster validation, and private key security, returning the internet to its original ideals of openness, privacy, and freedom.
author: Shiro Akihiko <shiroakihiko@proton.me>
